pullrequest.title: Remove plain 'qwt' leaving only 'qwt-qt5', since it links to Qt4 version.

content.raw: Ah, thought something like that might be true. Too bad.  Well, to be fair, it does work on Xenial, it just tripped me up rather badly.  It could be left as-is to be safe.  It's probably more correct to have `if(Linux) set(QWT_LIB_NAME "qwt-qt5")`, but just checking them both is probably safer in the general case.
content.html: Ah, thought something like that might be true. Too bad. Well, to be fair, it does work on Xenial, it just tripped me up rather badly. It could be left as-is to be safe. It's probably more correct to have if(Linux) set(QWT_LIB_NAME "qwt-qt5"), but just checking them both is probably safer in the general case.
